mapbaltimore 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

Boundary data

baltimore_city

A generalized political boundary for Baltimore City

baltimore_city_detailed

A detailed physical boundary for Baltimore City

neighborhoods

Baltimore City Neighborhood Boundaries

council_districts

Baltimore City Council Districts

legislative_districts

Baltimore City State Legislative Districts

congressional_districts

Baltimore City Congressional Districts

planning_districts

Baltimore City Planning Districts

csas

Baltimore City Community Statistical Areas

police_districts

Baltimore City Police Districts

wards_1797_1918

Baltimore City Ward Boundaries, 1797-1918

U.S. Census area data

baltimore_blocks

U.S. Census Blocks (2010 Decennial) in Baltimore City

baltimore_block_groups

U.S. Census Block Groups in Baltimore City

baltimore_tracts

U.S. Census Tracts in Baltimore City

Other data on physical features or public services

baltimore_water

Baltimore Rivers and Streams

parks

Baltimore City Parks

streets

Baltimore City Street Center lines

baltimore_mihp

Maryland Inventory of Historic Properties in Baltimore City

bcps_programs

Baltimore City Public School Programs

bcps_zones

Baltimore City Public Schools School Zones or School Attendance Zones

mta_bus_lines

Maryland Transit Administration Summer 2020 Bus Routes

real_property

Baltimore City Real Property Data

request_types

Baltimore City Request Types

zoning

Baltimore City Zoning Code

explore_baltimore

Explore Baltimore Heritage

Get local data for mapping and analysis

get_area()

Return geography for selected area type and name.

check_area()

Validate area provided to mapping or charting function.

get_buffered_area()

Get buffered area

get_nearby_areas()

Get nearby areas

get_area_mask()

Get a mask for an area

get_area_census_geography()

Get U.S. Census geography overlapping with an area.

get_area_streets()

Get area streets

get_real_property()

Get real property data for an area

get_zoning()

Get zoning data a local area

Map local data using ggplot2

map_area_in_city()

Maps an area in the context of the city

map_area_highlighted()

Maps a highlighted area within the context of multiple areas

map_area_with_snapbox()

Maps an area or areas using the snapbox package

map_area_bcps_programs()

Map BCPS programs and attendance zones for a local area

map_decade_built()

Map real property data to show decade built

map_tenure()

Map real property data to show tenure for neighborhood

map_vacancy()

Map real property data to show vacant and improved properties in an area

map_zoning()

Map zoning for a local area

map_area_mta_services()

Map MTA services

map_area_parks()

Map area parks and open spaces

Modify or add to a map

set_map_theme()

Set default map theme

label_area_streets()

Label area street names at selected locations

expand_limits_to_area()

Expand limits of ggplot map to a selected area

Get Open Street Map data

get_osm_feature()

Get OSM feature

Get and plot Open Baltimore data (not working)

open_baltimore_api_key()

Install an Open Baltimore API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use

get_open_baltimore_resource()

Get dataset from Open Baltimore with optional SoQL parameters

get_citations()

Get selected Environmental Control Board citations from Open Baltimore data portal

get_crimes()

Get selected crime incidents from Open Baltimore data portal

get_permits()

Get selected housing permits from Open Baltimore data portal

plot_permits()

Plot selected housing permits from Open Baltimore data portal

get_service_requests()

Get selected 311 Service Requests from Open Baltimore data portal

Get Maryland Open data

maryland_open_data_api_key()

Install a Maryland Open Data Portal API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use

get_maryland_open_resource()

Get dataset from Maryland Open Data portal with optional SoQL parameters
